sourcesContent:
<input 
    type="text"
    class="py-2 px-3 rounded-md text-zinc-100 placeholder:text-zinc-300 bg-zinc-950 w-full border-[1px] border-zinc-300 outline-none"
    [placeholder]="placeholder"
    [type]="type"
    [value]="inputValue"
    (change)="handleChange($event)"
    [name]="name"
>
